title: Festive Season Savings
description: Join us for centre-wide festive season specials across food, fashion, and services. Enjoy exclusive deals and extended trading hours throughout December.

title: Breakfast Special at Mugg & Bean
description: Start your day right with our breakfast combo: coffee, eggs, and toast for R65. Valid Monday to Friday, 7am-10am.

title: New Year's Eve Celebration
description: Ring in the new year at Clearview Square! Live entertainment, food specials, and extended hours. Join us from 8pm for a family-friendly celebration.

title: New Year Fitness Challenge at F45
description: Kick-start your 2026 fitness goals! Join F45's January challenge with 50% off your first month. Free fitness assessment for new members.
